coreAttributes.name: Leather Whip
coreAttributes.description: A sleek whip made from woven leather.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] Leather Whip around [npc.her] shoulder, so that [npc.she] may ready it at a moment's notice.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] coil up [npc.her] Leather Whip, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Lashing out with [npc.her] Leather whip, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike [npc2.name] in the chest; the whip hits [npc2.her], draining [npc2.her] energy!
Lashing out with [npc.her] Leather whip, [npc.name] [npc.verb(hit)] [npc2.name] in the side. The whip coils around [npc2.name] waist tightly squeezing and draining [npc2.her] energy!
With a wide swing of [npc.her] Leather whip, [npc.name] [npc.verb(hit)] [npc2.name] with a glancing lash, allowing the whip to drain [npc2.her] energy!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.name] wildly [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] Leather whip, but [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(avoid)] the strike!
Lashing out with [npc.her] Leather whip, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] short, missing [npc2.name] entirely!
Lashing out with [npc.her] Leather whip, [npc.name] [npc.verb(stumble)] causing the strike to go wide, missing [npc2.name] entirely!
